name: High Voltage: Intellectual Property Simulator
description:
Game made with 2 others for Shammy-Jam 2018, credited in-game. This was the product of my first game jam, with the theme  of "PowerSpike".

Mac and Windows builds included.

Mac build might not work in Windows + Mac build, use Mac separate build instead.

Credits:

Made By:

Noah Gale (programming, music)

Darby Schworm (art)

Max Perraut (programming)

Free assets used:

Lightning Bolt Effect by Jeff Johnson (Digital Ruby) (Unity)

Sound effects from Little Robot Sound Factory (OpenGameArt)
